"Explaining \"Mag SP Auto Actions\"":
"When your Mag reaches level 200, your Mag will learn a \"SP Auto Action\".

SP Auto Actions are automatically learnt based on the stats of the Mag.
"

"SP Auto Actions will automatically activate when certain conditions are met. Examples include fighting a powerful enemy, receiving damage, and many more!

Devices that will let you swap your Mag's SP Auto Action with one of your choice are available from the Excube Exchange Shop.

However, these actions cannot be used if your Mag's energy is 0. Take proper care that your Mag is properly fed to ensure a healthy activation of these SP Auto Actions."
